description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to specify the relationship between the start/end of the related service request(s) (from TQ2-3, TQ2-4 or TQ2-5) and the current service request from ORC-2, 3 or 4. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the TQ2 segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0504 (Sequence Condition Code)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

display.value: End related service request(s), end current service request.

definition.value: End related service request(s), end current service request.

display.value: End related service request(s), start current service request.

definition.value: End related service request(s), start current service request.

display.value: Start related service request(s), start current service request.

definition.value: Start related service request(s), start current service request.

display.value: Start related service request(s), end current service request.

definition.value: Start related service request(s), end current service request.
